overview: Slammiversary (2016) is an upcoming professional wrestling pay-per-view (PPV) event produced by Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA). It will take place on June 12 at the Impact Zone in Orlando, Florida. It will be the twelfth event under the Slammiversary chronology and the first event in the 2016 TNA PPV schedule
title: TNA Slammiversary 2016
